titleStmt.title: Ben H. Allen et al. to Unknown
CWG7228

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: We the undersigned whose names are here unto enrolled petition the release of Lewis Smith from the indictments of government which now stand against him

H L Yager I am on the other paper
Ben H. Allen
John Libby
Geo W Lawrence
Wm G Berry
William Scott
J F. Strothers Clergyman
A Lancaster
J. R Logan
John C. Vennice
W, B Combs
J B Scott
W, F, Scott
J S Turner
E Cox
W S Williams
A. F. Dunn
Jo. S. Sims
Joel Jackson
J, F, Martin, Clergyman
J. S. Mitchell
William Burnett
Grif Sams
Marsial Esters
T, P, Jones
Haden Jones
Josiph Duglis
Thomas Morgan
Joseph. S. Chilten
Jacob Smith
W P Maddox
Thos.P Ford
Jesse Coombs
Thomas H Coombs
John S Jenkins J, P,
James Roberson
Wm O. Coleman
F M Smith
Rev Jacob Hugley
Jol. Beasley
Augustus Beasley
John Beasley
S C Yager
B. Sidebottoms
A. B. Smith
W N, Smith
Adison Mitchael
Elijah Willhoite
Bird Pruette
Allen Burton
Henry McElwain
F Willis
John J. Morgan
Nathaniel Shepard
W R Morgan
F M Abbott
John A Burnett
Jas M Branch
E N Garratt
B G Wright
If you wish it I can get ma^n^y more names
